website_summaries.verdict: More expensive than our other picks, but if you like the idea of adjustable height, dual hooks, and extra length, it's well worth the cost.
pros: Each hook holds up to 12 lbs
Ideal for large bird feeders or flower baskets
Exceptionally strong and sturdy, even at the tallest setting
cons: A handful of owners felt installation was a bit tricky

customer_reviews.title: Not Erva's best
customer_reviews.text: I have been buy Erva bird stands for years and I was on the fence with this one. Opened it up and the paint is chipping on the main pole by the stand. One would expect this not be painted so lightly. On the fence and for this kind of money it always bother me when stuff comes like garbage
customer_reviews.author: sterlinghawk

customer_reviews.title: 4 hooks are better than 2
customer_reviews.text: We bought the 4-hanger shepherd hook to reduce the number of "obstructions" in our yard that we need to mow around. It works from that standpoint as we were able to replace two 2-hanger shepherd hooks with this item. We were a little disappointed that the hanger was advertised as 93" as the maximum height but, in reality, that includes the inches that get anchored into the ground which reduces the actual maximum height to 78". Wish it was a little taller.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Walton

customer_reviews.title: OK but Pricey
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and well packaged. Easy to assemble. Ground prongs need a slightly tapered end to more easily insert into the ground and tightening screws are not very secure. Sturdy construction but a few lock washers are needed for better long-term stability.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shepherds hook!
customer_reviews.text: Ability to adjust height is the strong attraction but the four legged base, uneven legs, makes it extremely stable at any height.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Etter

customer_reviews.title: It was missing parts, not very sturdy or stable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this 4 arm shepherds hook and only received 2 arms, so 2 of the arms are missing! Can't seem to find any information on where to contact the company. I am hoping they see this review and send me the 2 missing arm hooks! It is definitely not as sturdy as the ones that are all one piece. You can't really hang plants on it unless they are light weight and completely equal to balance it out. It's good for wind chimes and other garden type accessories but NOT plants unfortunately. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Julie Busche

customer_reviews.title: Shepherds hook
customer_reviews.text: I use this shepherds hook for my hanging basket flowers. It is sturdy with the weight of the baskets and works great. It is heavier than I anticipated - not some cheap metal that bends easy.
customer_reviews.author: Redfairy

customer_reviews.title: Shepherd Hook Hits A Home Run!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Holds two metal birdhouses with seed with no problem. Highly recommend this product and seller. Will buy from again. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cat

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Item came with only two pieces and put together they do not come up to 7 feet and hardly made it to my shoulder , and I am over 6 foot. If there is a missing piece please send it or I am sending this back. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: LCS

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but it IS strong!
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey, but it is actually strong enough to hold 4 hanging baskets!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Very tall but a strong wind knocked it over. Only happened once so I’m glad I purchased. I’ve bought many shepherd hooks in the past. This is the only one I have where the pole is in 2 pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Trish K.

customer_reviews.title: mine has fallen apart, not sturdy , welded areas just broke. a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could get a refund, most likely not. just wasted my money.DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM
customer_reviews.author: jel

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for flower planters. When you extend it the top part of pole cannot hold the weight. So now it’s 2 ft off ground. Totally upsetting considering the price. If you are hanging a small wind chime it might work.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces multiple times
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to get a sturdy/heavy-duty, double shepherd’s hook with a space between the hooks (so bird legs would not get stuck, etc.). Received package badly damaged with multiple pieces missing. Packed it back up, returned and waited for a replacement. Second delivery came, box looked to be in good shape, opened and different pieces missing. Packed back up and returned. Did not bother trying a third time. If all pieces were there, it would have been easy to fully put together, and it felt quite sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: mamac

customer_reviews.title: Costs a little more but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Have several shepherds hooks and this by far is the bast one and worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Kim Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Not very sturdy for the price that I had to pay wishing it was a little sturdier when placed in the ground. The package when shipped was a mess as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L.

customer_reviews.title: Strong pole
customer_reviews.text: Wobbles a little more than I’d like for the price, but still Ok.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Wisinski

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and easy to set up to use
customer_reviews.text: I took it out of the box and left it at the smaller size and it just works perfect for the hummers. They now have a smaller one and also the taller one. They love it and so do I
customer_reviews.author: jpkantqs

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and holds heavy baskets
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical. Read the reviews plus and minus. Tore myself up and down over the expensive price. In the end took the chance and bought it. Am I happy with this product. It was better than I expected. We had huge 60 mile an hour winds here and this held up. It is sturdy and I just cannot say enough about how much I love it
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn A. Kokotis

customer_reviews.title: The four prongs are easy to maneuver into the ground
customer_reviews.text: The four prongs are easy to maneuver into the ground. It's very sturdy and shouldn't fall over. The hooks are wide and do not accommodate my feeders so I had to improvise with rubber bands to keep them on even in wind storms.
customer_reviews.author: He1234

customer_reviews.title: REQUIRE A NEW ARM FOR THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: the shipping box was damaged. Multiple large holes in the box with parts protruding. Unfortunately, I had the pole in the ground before I realized one of the arms was missing. I have asked for a replacement arm. the rest of the product is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: CathyT

customer_reviews.title: A bit unsecure at the hooks
customer_reviews.text: The two hook on the top do not insert very far into their receptacles on the pole, which makes them a less secure that I'd like to see them. (and they droop). If square ends of the hooks were a bit longer (about 1 inch) they would be much more secure. Other than that, its fine.
customer_reviews.author: paul wagner

customer_reviews.title: missing adjustable piece
customer_reviews.text: What kind of scam is this? I saw other reviewers saying a piece of the stand (to make it adjustable) was missing but thought surely you would not let that happen again. WRONG! Only the bottom piece that goes in the ground and the hook were in the box. Scam.
customer_reviews.author: M D

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered as per description. 😐
customer_reviews.text: YB I am very disappointed. The description was 4.6’ to 7’ adjustable shepherd hook. Is was not that. It was just about 4’ high. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Elma Watson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I only used the quadrilateral end ofvthe product inserted in a much longer pipe in order to support 4 humminbird feeders.
customer_reviews.author: Grasbefore

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this double Shepherds hook to hang two of my plants.The plants I hung are both in 12 in pots and the plants are rather huge. After watering they are quite heavy. I haven't had any problem with the sturdiness of the Shepherd hooks even in strong wind. I definitely will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: gordie collins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!  Love being able to adjust the height!
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic! We placed it outside our living room window so we could see the birds feeding from the bird feeder hanging on the pole. Nice sturdy pole. Of course the squirrels took over, so we just got some vaseline and greased the pole. No more pesky squirrels stealing the birdseed. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Alena

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, especially the option of various heights. Very solidly made.
customer_reviews.author: Judie Kreitman

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace the quad armed Shepard’s hook I had for bird feeders that deer destroyed. I was hesitant because of the price and when it came, it was missing an arm. I called Erva and they sent the missing arm in 2 days. It was very easy to assemble and seems sturdier than what I used to have. The birds love it and time will tell if it can withstand deer.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine A. Vajgrt

customer_reviews.title: shepherds hook
customer_reviews.text: I really like the sturdiness of this shepherd hook, along with the height. It is a little pricey but only one available when I needed one this height.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Damaged box. Missing part!
customer_reviews.text: It came missing one of the arms so I can only hang one plant instead of two. Box arrived broken. Too much trouble to send back. Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Design and Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very well designed and great manufacturing quality. Two of the four base prongs can be adjusted if there are obstructions. This was higher priced than another one I looked at and I am glad I spent the extra money. This item will function well and for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Theis

customer_reviews.title: The shephard hook I ordered only had 1 hook not four
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered your shephard hook with four hooks. Only received one hook. Package had been re taped when received. What can you do for me? I should of got extension with four hooks. If you do to all customers shame on you! I paid good money for this item.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Deamicis

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Seems solid & well made. just put it up so will see how it holds up over winter.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased a 2nd one because the first was just what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Poncetta

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: i Like this very much. It’s a lot sturdier and higher than the cheap shepherds hook I was using for my bird feeders.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Lynn Urbanski

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty. No directions but easy to put together. Very satisfies.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Melnyk

customer_reviews.title: A nice double Shepard’s hook bird feeder pole
customer_reviews.text: The 4 prong foot made the bird feeder very secure. The double Shepard’s hook is great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Clark

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: I order this as a gift and it was so nice I order another for myself
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie Parris

customer_reviews.title: Well made product!
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price. It’s really sturdy and a great height for my bird feeders.
customer_reviews.author: Loripa

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT BALANCE
customer_reviews.text: HEAVY DUTY, WELL MADE, AND HELD TWO HANGING BASKETS, BUT I JUST HUNG PNE TO BE SAFE IN THE WIND. I AM SURE IT WOULD HOLD TWO THO.
customer_reviews.author: nan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The Double Shepard hook is made of sturdy metal and its 4 prongs in the ground keep it upright - even when the squirrels climb up it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plant hanger
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Looked all over and couldn't find in stores.
customer_reviews.author: N. Douglas Owens

customer_reviews.title: Holds a large feeder
customer_reviews.text: It is a little harder to install but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: outer limits

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This was much sturdier than I expected. Very nice item.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This held up to a wind storm with two plants on it, where three others broke. Now I need to find it again to order three more.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie G

customer_reviews.title: Using for hummingbird feeders
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this for hummingbird feeders. I found that it was easy to install and looks nice in the butterfly garden.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon E Condon

customer_reviews.title: Not good product on what I payed for it going back
customer_reviews.text: Cheap made broke after a hung a plant on it dont buy it
customer_reviews.author: gabriele barker

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to assemble/adjust
customer_reviews.text: This turned out better than expected! I was concerned for the stability of the hooks since they are so easily adjustable. So pleased—as are the birds!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to my garden.
customer_reviews.text: Put this in my new butterfly garden to hold water and fruit for.
customer_reviews.author: Judith B

customer_reviews.title: Extremely sturdy I would recommend highly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to hang a basket of flowers and it works really really well
customer_reviews.author: Shellie Singer

customer_reviews.title: Useless unless soil is soft
customer_reviews.text: This product won't work in packed or hard dirt because there are no prongs on the bottom to drive it into the ground. Useless to me. Sitting in the basement gathering dust.
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable four hanger shepherd hook
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Heavier and better made than a normal shepherds hook. Received quickly too.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Alice

customer_reviews.title: As described. thank you
customer_reviews.text: I looked quite awhile for this item and it's all as described for my birdcage display
customer_reviews.author: meeee

customer_reviews.title: Love the 4 prong bass. Makes it very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Live the 4 prong bass. Have a hummingbird feeder hanging on it and the hummers love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra K Fugate

customer_reviews.title: Standing solid thru storms!
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid and sturdy product that works for me to hang my bird feeder and bird bath.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Shopper, FL

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: Only issue is that it was missing one of the shepherd hooks
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great value- sturdy AND attractive!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very impressed with this product! I have many bird feeders and the hooks are a perfect support for them- even large ones!
customer_reviews.author: melissa Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: this product was unavailable
customer_reviews.text: after many weeks, I was emailed that this item was unavailabole
customer_reviews.author: judith rielle

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very sturdy even with large and heavy baskets
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It performed just like I wanted it to do
customer_reviews.text: It performed just like I wanted it to do. It is very secure and my plants look beautiful on it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Q. Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It held up in 60+mph wind and two heavy potted plants
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this, I have several bird feeders hangin on it..
customer_reviews.author: Christi L.

customer_reviews.title: See what I wrote above
customer_reviews.text: This product only came with one hook so it is useless
customer_reviews.author: Joseph B Swan Jr

customer_reviews.title: For upside-down tomatoes
customer_reviews.text: This shepherd's hook was very easy to assemble. Getting it to stay up took a little effort, but once you get the prongs into the soil, standing on the base should be enough to sink all of them fully into the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Oriana S.

product_meta.title: Erva Adjustable Double Shepherd Hook, Black, 4' 6" to 7'H - Made in The USA
product_meta.description: Extremely Sturdy, Adjustable Shepherd’s Pole Erva’s double arm adjustable shepherd’s pole adjusts from 63” up to 94”, providing the perfect height to hang your favorite feeders. Prefer a single arm or four arm pole? Erva offers both of these options, providing you with the shepherd’s pole to fit your specific situation. This product includes (1) Double Arm Adjustable Pole, (1) Large Thumbscrew for locking pole height in place, (1) 4-pronged anchor for optimal stability. Made in the USA in Chicago, IL Erva products are manufactured right here in the United States in their factory located in Chicago, IL. Don’t bother with cheap knock-off products from overseas when you can purchase an American-made product that will stand the test of time. This shepherd’s pole is made with materials sourced from different parts of the US, allowing you to purchase with confidence in a quality product. Easy to Install, Extremely Versatile, and a Great Value Erva’s shepherd’s poles can be used to hang anything from your favorite feeders to flower baskets. This product is a breeze to install. You will have your new shepherd’s pole hung in a matter of minutes. Having the ability to adjust the height of this pole gives you limitless options for hanging a variety of products. Erva’s Adjustable Double Shepherd’s Hook will exceed your expectations - try one today!
feature_bullets: ADJUSTABLE SHEPHERD POLE – Erva’s Double Arm Adjustable Pole can adjust from 63” up to a height of 94” providing the perfect height to hang your feeders
INCLUDES THE FOLLOWING – (1) Double Arm Adjustable Pole, (1) Large Thumbscrew for locking pole height in place, (1) 4-pronged anchor for optimal stability
30 DAY MONEY BACK GUARANTEE – If you’re not satisfied with Erva’s 5 Piece Feeder Pole Set, you can return it within 30 days for your money back, no questions asked
VERSATILE HANGING POLE – Use Erva’s Double Arm Adjustable Pole to hang your favorite feeder or flower basket
PERFECT GIFT FOR THE OUTDOOR ENTHUSIAST – This product is the perfect Mother’s Day, Father’s Day, Christmas, or Birthday gift for anyone who spends time in their garden

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars101 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
